main_definition: The word 'Tex' is not a commonly used idiom or phrase in English, but it can have different meanings depending on the context. In this case, I will provide some alternative interpretations and examples for each meaning.

meanings_and_examples.example: My Tex friend loves to BBQ ribs.
The company specializes in producing high-quality tex fabrics.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A unit of measurement for the thickness or density of fibers, used primarily in the textile industry
meanings_and_examples.example: This fabric has a Tex rating of 150, indicating its fiber thickness and density.
